description:
It turns out that the biggest proponents of hate speech laws are also the greatest offenders.

First Minister Humza Yousaf, who championed in support of Scotland's new hate crime law, has received more complaints than J.K. Rowling over an anti-white rant he made in 2020.

If you need more of a background on the law click here. But basically, Scotland made it illegal to hate someone.

So far there have been about 4,000 complaints and we knew the mob was going to go after Rowling for not bending a knee to the anti-women bandwagon. But it's more surprising, yet reasonable, that the majority of complaints have been towards Yousaf.

But hey, if you are going to make it illegal to hate someone you might as well start with the mo
title: The official who promoted Scotland's new hate crime law? He's received MORE complaints than J.K. Rowling for his anti-white hatred
